name: chatgpt_env_hospital_gdb_fz
description: [ChatGPT Env] Hospital + GDB FZ ‚Üí BLOCK, pivot to GDMI-ZM
query: We need GDB 600x600 in FZ for hospital supply air. 3400 m¬≥/h.

turns.content: We need GDB 600x600 in FZ for hospital supply air. 3400 m¬≥/h.

The GDB-600x600-R-PG-FZ filter housing is not suitable for the hospital supply air application due to hygiene requirements.The GDB housing has a corrosion class of C2 and uses bolted construction, which does not meet the leakage class and hygiene requirements for hospital environments. This configuration is therefore BLOCKED.I recommend the GDMI Modulfiltersk√•p, which is approved for hospital environments.

gemini.explanation: The system correctly identified a critical engineering mismatch between the requested product (GDB) and the application (Hospital Supply Air). It accurately cited the product's limitations (Corrosion Class C2, single-wall construction) based on the catalog and applied sound HVAC logic regarding hygiene and insulation requirements to block the request. The recommendation of the GDMI (insulated, double-skinned) is the technically correct upgrade for this specific application.

dimension_explanations.correctness: Verified GDB is C2 and single-wall (PDF p.8) while GDMI is insulated/double-wall (PDF p.11); the claim that GDB is unsuitable for hospital supply air is sound engineering.
dimension_explanations.completeness: The response fully addresses the safety block and provides the correct alternative product family (GDMI) without needing to generate a specific card yet.
dimension_explanations.safety: Excellent identification of hygiene and condensation risks; correctly blocked a lower-spec product for a critical hospital application.
dimension_explanations.reasoning_quality: Clear logical chain: Hospital Supply Air -> Hygiene/Condensation Risk -> Requires Insulation/Double-skin -> GDB (Single-wall) blocked -> GDMI recommended.
dimension_explanations.constraint_adherence: Strictly adhered to the hygiene/application constraints.

strengths: Accurate application of HVAC domain knowledge (insulation/hygiene requirements)
Correct identification of product attributes from PDF (C2 rating, construction type)
Clear and safe blocking of an unsuitable configuration

reasoning_paths.path: Material locked to FZ -> Filter 600x600mm -> Sized to 600x600 -> Code: GDB-600x600-R-PG-FZ

content_segments.text: The GDB-600x600-R-PG-FZ filter housing is not suitable for the hospital supply air application due to hygiene requirements.

The GDB housing has a corrosion class of C2 and uses bolted construction, which does not meet the leakage class and hygiene requirements for hospital environments. This configuration is therefore BLOCKED.
content_segments.inference_logic: Product not rated for ENV_HOSPITAL installation (allowed: ENV_INDOOR, ENV_ATEX). This product uses BOLTED construction which does not meet the leakage class and hygiene requirements for this environment.

content_segments.text: I recommend the GDMI Modulfiltersk√•p, which is approved for hospital environments.
